title: [BUG] i cant install lol in MAC OS X 10.9.5
body: when i try to install it i get repairing failed what the problem help me pls {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: No worries m8 apple sucks anyways.

Mac client is breaking down and i dont think riot cares to expend the massive effort needed to fix it.

Bootcamp windows, it will run better anyway. free and easy.
